name: AWS Textract Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Textract Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends data to Amazon Textract

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends data to Amazon Textract | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: analyzeExpense

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded. Supported file types: PNG, JPEG.
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded. Supported file types: PNG, JPEG. | 默认值: data | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
